name: Drink & Blink
description: Drink & Stretch Reminder – Prioritize Your Well-being, One Gentle Nudge at a Time! Drink & Stretch Reminder is your personal wellness companion right inside your browser. Designed for students, remote workers, developers, and anyone glued to a screen, this extension gently nudges you to take essential wellness breaks — sip water and stretch your body — just when you need it.
